content: st to join do not fo 108 sts ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 3 round 2 chain 6 counts as 1st double_crochet and chain 3 skip 2 sts double_crochet into next chain 3 x 34 skip 2 sts double_crochet into next double_crochet into 3rd chain of beginning chain 6 do not fo 36 sts 36 chsps ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 4 rnds 3- 18 chain 6 counts as 1st double_crochet and chain 3 double_crochet into next chsp & chain 3 x 34 double_crochet into next chsp double_crochet into 3rd chain of beginning chain 6 do not fo 36 sts 36 chsps round 19 chain 6 counts as 1st double_crochet and chain 3 double_crochet into next chsp & chain 3 x 34 double_crochet into next chsp chain 3 & slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning chain 6 do not fo 36 sts 36 chsps round 20 3 single_crochet into each chsp around do not join do not fo 108 sts ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 5 rnds 21-24 use a sm to mark your 1st st work in continuous rnds single_crochet into each st around 108 sts round 25 continue in continuous rnds single_crochet into next st & chain 75 skip 30 sts single_crochet into next 23 sts x 2 do not join do not fo 48 sts 2 chain s of 75 ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 6 round 26 continue in continuous rnds single_crochet into 1st st single_crochet into each chain single_crochet next 24 sts single_crochet into each chain single_crochet next 23 sts do not join do not fo 198 sts rnds 27- 28 continue in continuous rnds single_crochet into each st around do not join do not fo 198 sts round 29 slip_stitch into each st around & fo 198 sts ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 7 finishing tuck the mesh bag into the pocket folding the pocket right-side out at the opening of the pouch on the square that is not attached to the bag sew a button below the opening of the pocket at the opening of the pouch on the square that is attached to the bag find the center st and attach yarn chain 17 slip_stitch back into same st & fo note before securing the chain make sure the loop closure is a good fit to the placement of the button and adjust the chain as needed ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 8
